entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Winds easing from the south during this evening and at night. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Winds easing from the south during this afternoon. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
